title: What are some historic events that have happened on September 17th (my birthday)? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can go to the Wikipedia article for September 17th and take a look at a huge list of them: September 17. After a quick perusal of the list, I can’t see anything extremely momentous that happened on that day. Certainly not anything that really jumps out as world-changing. A few battles happened but none that had any far reaching consequences though. The U.S. Constitution was signed, but in spite of that being important, it wasn’t exactly as groundbreaking as an event in that it didn’t break any new ground or change anything. Take a look at the list and see if anything of interest jumps out. It is Batman day, apparently.
Here. Let me Google that for you. And, done. Today in History for September 17th September 17 Welp, you’re welcome. Happy Birthday!
